normalised: Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to a Brighter Future, Yaar!

unnormalised: Tired of endless application forms and missing deadlines? Fret not, students! Scholarship portals are the "jugaad" you need. These EdTech platforms are simplifying the hunt for financial aid, connecting deserving students with scholarships ranging from Rs. 5,000 to even covering entire degree programs at prestigious institutions like IIT Delhi.

These E D Tech platforms are simplifying the hunt for financial aid, connecting deserving students with scholarships ranging from rupee five thousand to even covering entire degree programs at prestigious institutions like I I T Delhi.

unnormalised: Think of them as a Tinder for scholarships – swipe right (metaphorically, of course!) on opportunities matching your profile. Many now offer personalized recommendations based on your academic record and interests. Forget scouring newspapers and dusty notice boards; these portals are updated in real-time, meaning you can catch deadlines even at 11:00 PM before they vanish!

unnormalised: Plus, they often list niche scholarships you wouldn't find otherwise - like ones for Bharatnatyam dancers or budding filmmakers from Bihar! Just be sure to check the legitimacy of the portal before sharing sensitive info. The UGC is expected to release guidelines on data privacy on 26/01/2024, so keep an eye out. Happy hunting and may your scholarship dreams come true by the application deadline of 15/03/2024! Also, a workshop on navigating these portals is scheduled for 10:00 hrs on 01/02/2024 at the Nehru Centre. Don't miss out!
